recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: A rich and savory Italian pasta dish made with ground beef, tomatoes, and herbs.
instructions: In a large skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned. Remove excess fat.
Add chopped onions and minced garlic, sauté until softened.
Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, red wine, oregano, and basil. Simmer for 20-25 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Drain.
Toss the cooked spaghetti with the Bolognese sauce. Serve with grated Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Vegan Tacos
recipes.description: A fresh and flavorful vegan taco dish with spiced cauliflower, topped with avocado and salsa.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Toss cauliflower florets in olive oil, chili powder, cumin, and paprika.
Spread cauliflower on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes, flipping halfway.
Warm taco shells in the oven for 5 minutes.
Assemble tacos by adding roasted cauliflower, sliced avocado, cilantro, and salsa. Garnish with lime wedges.

recipes.title: Classic Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy and soft pancakes, perfect for a leisurely breakfast or brunch.
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, combine milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and stir until just combined. The batter should be lumpy.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and lightly grease with butter or oil.
Pour about 1/4 cup of batter onto the skillet for each pancake. Cook for 2-3 minutes until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook for another 1-2 minutes.

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.description: A healthy salad with grilled chicken, mixed greens, and a tangy vinaigrette.
instructions: Preheat grill or grill pan over medium heat. Season chicken breasts with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until fully cooked.
Slice the grilled chicken into strips.
In a large bowl, toss the mixed greens, cucumber, onion, and feta cheese.
Top the salad with sliced chicken and drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette dressing.

recipes.title: Beef Stir Fry
recipes.description: A quick stir fry with tender beef strips, vegetables, and a savory sauce.
instructions: In a bowl, combine soy sauce, oyster sauce, hoisin sauce, sesame oil, ginger, and garlic.
Toss the beef strips in the sauce and let marinate for 10 minutes.
Heat a wok or skillet over high heat and add a little oil.
Stir fry the beef for 2-3 minutes until browned and cooked through. Remove from the pan.
In the same pan, stir fry the broccoli, bell pepper, and onion for 3-4 minutes.
Return the beef to the pan and add the cornstarch and water mixture. Stir until the sauce thickens and the beef is coated.

recipes.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
recipes.description: A rich, decadent dessert with a molten chocolate center.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Grease four ramekins with butter and lightly dust with flour.
Melt chocolate and butter together in a heatproof bowl over simmering water.
Whisk together powdered sugar, eggs, egg yolks, and vanilla extract until smooth.
Stir in the melted chocolate mixture and flour. Divide the batter evenly between the ramekins.
Bake for 12-14 minutes until the edges are set but the center is soft.
Let cool for 1 minute before inverting onto plates and serving.
